quote: Alone in the forest, Katsa sat on a stump and cried. She cried like a person whose heart is broken and wondered how, when two people loved each other, there could be such a broken heart.
quote_letters: ALONE IN THE FOREST KATSA SAT ON A STUMP AND CRIED SHE CRIED LIKE A PERSON WHOSE HEART IS BROKEN AND WONDERED HOW WHEN TWO PEOPLE LOVED EACH OTHER THERE COULD BE SUCH A BROKEN HEART
